abstract.text: A color or pattern to use when rendering a shape.

inlineContent.text: You create custom shape styles by declaring a type that conforms to the
protocol and implementing the required
function to
return a shape style that represents the desired appearance based on the
current environment.
For example this shape style reads the current color scheme from the
environment to choose the blend mode its color will be composited with:

code: func resolve(in environment: EnvironmentValues) -> some ShapeStyle {

concrete styles that OpenSwiftUI defines. To indicate a specific color or
pattern, you can use
